system.description: You spit a corrosive bio-daemon that begins to rewrite the target’s genetic code. It writhes and twists, losing one turn, then saves. Success: it suffers [[/r 4d6]] damage as its body voids benign alien tumors. Failure: it suffers [[/r 2d6x]] damage as four hooked limbs of muscle and keratin erupt from its skin. Each limb (L4, 8 life) attacks the nearest creature or the target for [[/r 1d6]] damage per hit. After a few minutes, the infestation loses coherence and the limbs collapse into sticky goo. Extract: ripping the infestation out is tough and deals another [[/r 2d6x]] damage to the target. The creature (L4) continues to attack mindlessly.

power.overcharge: the target automatically fails its save and immediately suffers [[/r 4d6x]] damage as the infestation erupts and begin attacking. If target dies, a fully-grown flesh horror (L6, 54 life) bursts from the corpse in 1d4 rounds. It is under nobody’s control.
